latihan.arahan: Join the sentences using (and, but, so, because).

soalan.teks: I like apples. I like oranges. (and)
He is tall. His brother is short. (but)
soalan.jawapan: He is tall but his brother is short.

soalan.teks: She stayed home. She was sick. (because)
soalan.jawapan: She stayed home because she was sick.

soalan.teks: It was raining. I took an umbrella. (so)
soalan.jawapan: It was raining so I took an umbrella.

soalan.teks: You can have tea. You can have coffee. (or)
soalan.jawapan: You can have tea or coffee.

soalan.teks: He studied hard. He failed the test. (but)
soalan.jawapan: He studied hard but he failed the test.

soalan.teks: I was hungry. I ate a sandwich. (so)
soalan.jawapan: I was hungry so I ate a sandwich.

soalan.teks: Close the door. Lock it. (and)
soalan.jawapan: Close the door and lock it.

soalan.teks: She cried. She lost her doll. (because)
soalan.jawapan: She cried because she lost her doll.

soalan.teks: The car is old. It still runs well. (but)
soalan.jawapan: The car is old but it still runs well.
